# Muraly - AR Mural Visualization App

## About
Muraly is a free, web-based augmented reality application that allows users to visualize murals and wall art in real spaces using their device's camera. No installation required - works directly in any modern browser.

## Key Features
- AR Visualization: See murals projected onto real walls in real-time
- Image & Sketch Mode: Upload images and convert to sketch outlines
- Multi-Device Sharing: Share AR sessions with unlimited devices via peer-to-peer
- Save & Load Sessions: Persist mural configurations
- Video Recording: Record timelapse or full video of creation process
- Touch Gestures: Intuitive controls for move, scale, rotate, and opacity

## Technology
- Web-based (HTML5, JavaScript)
- WebRTC for peer-to-peer connections
- Camera API for AR features
- No backend required - fully client-side

## Website
